name: Flavortown (CaleAlexander)
description:
"Do you remember who you are?"

---

The fourth installment is here, and I'm confident it's the best one yet. If you're somehow here randomly and not part of the Chefs Council then please play the last three games on my page before you play this, they're really short. This game is me learning how to make custom screens (imagebuttons and imagemaps) and doing some gui replacement .  I think I'm finding my "style" for VNs now. Please enjoy!

(let me know if there's bugs or typos please it's 3am and I may have missed something)
